Uses of Class
com.adp.marketplace.connection.configuration.ConnectionConfiguration

  • Packages that use ConnectionConfiguration 
    Package Description
    com.adp.marketplace.connection.configuration  
    com.adp.marketplace.connection.core  
    com.adp.marketplace.connection.utils  

    • Uses of ConnectionConfiguration in com.adp.marketplace.connection.configuration

      Subclasses of ConnectionConfiguration in com.adp.marketplace.connection.configuration 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AuthorizationCodeConfiguration
      AuthorizationCodeConfiguration is an implementation class of base abstract class ConnectionConfiguration which allows an application to configure connection with GrantType authorization_code based on OAuth 2.0 Specification.
      class  ClientCredentialsConfiguration
      ClientCredentialsConfiguration is an implementation class of base abstract class ConnectionConfiguration which allows an application to configure connection with GrantType client_credentials based on OAuth 2.0 Specification.

    • Uses of ConnectionConfiguration in com.adp.marketplace.connection.core

      Methods in com.adp.marketplace.connection.core that return ConnectionConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConnectionConfiguration ClientCredentialsConnection.getConnectionConfiguration()
      Returns the Connection configuration
      ConnectionConfiguration AuthorizationCodeConnection.getConnectionConfiguration()
      Returns the Connection configuration
      ConnectionConfiguration ADPAPIConnectionFactory.init(java.lang.String grantType)
      Returns an instance of Configuration object based on the authorization grant type
      Methods in com.adp.marketplace.connection.core with parameters of type ConnectionConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ADPAPIConnection ADPAPIConnectionFactory.createConnection(ConnectionConfiguration connectionConfiguration)
      this method returns an instance of Connection object based on the authorization configuration
      void ClientCredentialsConnection.setConnectionConfiguration(ConnectionConfiguration connectionConfiguration)
      Maps the connection configuration AuthorizationCodeConfiguration to this connection
      void AuthorizationCodeConnection.setConnectionConfiguration(ConnectionConfiguration connectionConfiguration)

    • Uses of ConnectionConfiguration in com.adp.marketplace.connection.utils

      Methods in com.adp.marketplace.connection.utils with parameters of type ConnectionConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<org.apache.http.NameValuePair> ConnectionUtils.getClientCredentials(ConnectionConfiguration connectionConfiguration)
      Returns a List of name value pairs consisting of client credentials and grant type associated to this configuration
      org.apache.http.impl.client.CloseableHttpClient SSLUtils.getHttpsClient(ConnectionConfiguration connectionConfiguration)
      Returns an instance of CloseableHttpClient
      boolean ConnectionValidatorUtils.validate(ConnectionConfiguration connectionConfiguration)
      Returns true if configuration has required SSL attributes, client credentials and valid url's, false otherwise or validation exceptions.
